接口 KnowledgeViewMapper

所有超级接口:
com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.BaseMapper<KnowledgeView>, com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.Mapper<KnowledgeView>
@Mapper public interface KnowledgeViewMapper extends com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.BaseMapper<KnowledgeView>
知识浏览记录Mapper接口

  • 方法详细资料

    • selectByUserId

      @Select("SELECT * FROM knowledge_view WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY view_time DESC") List<KnowledgeView> selectByUserId(Long userId)
      获取用户浏览记录

    • selectByKnowledgeId

      @Select("SELECT * FROM knowledge_view WHERE knowledge_id = #{knowledgeId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY view_time DESC") List<KnowledgeView> selectByKnowledgeId(Long knowledgeId)
      获取知识浏览记录

    • countViews

      @Select("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM knowledge_view WHERE knowledge_id = #{knowledgeId} AND deleted = 0 AND view_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}") Integer countViews(Long knowledgeId, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      统计时间段内的浏览次数

    • countUserViews

      @Select("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM knowledge_view WHERE knowledge_id = #{knowledgeId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0") Integer countUserViews(Long knowledgeId, Long userId)
      统计用户浏览次数
